articles.author: Shaun Powell
articles.title: A closer look at the striking metamorphosis of Tyrese Haliburton - NBA
articles.description: Indiana's dynamic point guard is carving out an entirely new reputation with his impressive play during these playoffs.
articles.content:
Get an All-Access pass as Tyrese Haliburton comes up huge again and Indiana takes a 1-0 series lead in the 2025 NBA Finals.
OKLAHOMA CITY  The last time he played for a world title, Tyrese Haliburto… [+9263 chars]
